history:
***history***
Ross Geller: (Neutral) So, um, what do you do for a living?
Kristin: (Neutral) Well, um, for the past few years I've been working.. ...which is funny because, that wasn't even my major.
Based on the conversation ***history*** above, as Carol Willick, please choose the most appropriate emotion among {Mad,Neutral,Joyful,Scared,Sad,Powerful,Peaceful} to respond to the Kristin
SourceData: Oh no. I thought you said they could shoot the spot without you.
Coct: That's interesting, I've always been curious about people's career paths and how they ended up where they are. What made you decide to pursue that field?
